title: Apple valued at $3 trillion, first company to ever reach milestone
description: Apple hits $3 million market cap for the first time ever Friday, a huge milestone for any tech company.

title: E-bike batteries are a fire risk. Here’s how to protect yourself.
description: Lithium-ion batteries power our smartphones, laptops and electric transportation. They’re also a safety risk we need to take seriously.

title: Those 10,000 5-star reviews are fake. Now they’ll also be illegal.
description: As much as 30 or 40 percent of online reviews are fake. Now the FTC is cracking down with new rules and hefty fines.

title: More Americans are retiring than ever before. See what that means for you.
description: As boomers age, the workforce will be older than ever. As they retire, the worker-to-retiree ratio will drop to lower than ever. Here's what that means for you.

title: Cyberattack knocks out satellite communications for Russian military
description: At least two groups claimed responsibility for the attack.
